monogr.author: Evagrius
monogr.title: Altercatio Legis inter Simonem Iudaeum et Theophilum Christianum

encodingDesc.p: The following text is encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.

ab.title: (LOCI GRAVIORIS MOXENTI, QV03 TEXTVI SVBIECI, TYPIS TRANSVERSIS DESURIPTI SVNT)
A) AVCTORES ECCLESIASTICI, QVOS EYAGRIVS NON NOMINATIM LAYDAT SED RESPICERE VIDETVR.

div.p: Tert. De orat. c. 20 .............. 12, 9 (sanctissimus)
Tertulliani Operum Index..... 5, 1. 19, 13 (receptus, plenitudo)
Cypriani Operum Index............. 19, 13 (plenitudo)
Symbolum Nicaenum .................. 4, 1-3

Iouinianus
Ambrosius , Ad Siricium 17, 2-7. 17, 15-18, 14
Prologus quattuor euang. ex comm. Hieronymi in Matth... 23, 3-5
Cassianus Conlat. XXII, 13 ................. 26, 11
Symbolum Athanasianum ............ 3, 5. 6-7. 17, 4

ab.title: B) PARALLELA, QVAE INTER ALTERCATIONEM ET AVCTORES SVB A) LAVDATOS EXISTVNT.
